page.title: 20CURRIE RESEARCHERS
page.content: THE INFORMATION IN THE PRECEDING PAGES WAS GATHERED IN THE SUMMER OF 1985 BY BOYS AND GIRLS IN JUNIPER GREEN PRIMARY SCHOOL IN EDINBURGH. THEY WENT OUT IN THEIR TEACHERS' CARS OR ON FOOT AND CHECKED ALL THE FIELDS,FARMS, ROADS, STREETS, HOUSES, SHOPS - EVERYTHING.IN ADDITION, THEY INTERVIEWED CERTAIN PEOPLE IN THE COMMUNITY, PEOPLE WHOM THEY CONSIDERED TO BE TYPICAL OF LOCAL RESIDENTS. OTHER CHILDREN WROTE STORIES IN SCHOOL AND SOME OF OUR TEACHERS TOOK THE PHOTOGRAPHS. ALTHOUGH OUR SCHOOL IS NOT IN CURRIE THE AREA GIVEN TO US BY THE DOMESDAY ORGANISERS HAD CURRIE AS ITS CENTRE AND COVERED THE CURRIE, BALERNO, JUNIPER GREEN AND COLINTON AREAS WHICH LIE TO THE SOUTH WEST OF EDINBURGH.
